model

Class WeatherModelImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.WeatherModelImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WeatherSystem

    public class WeatherModelImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements WeatherSystem
    Concrete implementation of WeatherSystem, provides most functionality for program. Can take callback objects for notifications on change in data.
    Author:
    Liam, Michael

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • stations

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,WeatherStation>> stations
        Just to make it clear, this hashmap stores australian states as a key and a hashmap of weatherstations as a value. The weather stations hashmap uses the town name as a key and the actual weather station object itself as a value.

      • favorites

        private java.util.ArrayList<WeatherStation> favorites
        List of all favorited weather stations for easy access.

      • cbList

        private java.util.List<IWeatherSystemCallback> cbList

    • Constructor Detail

      • WeatherModelImpl

        public WeatherModelImpl()
        Constructs a new weatherModel. Will attempt to instantiate the stations data with stations.json data.

    • Method Detail

      • refreshFavoriteWeatherData

        public void refreshFavoriteWeatherData()
        Description copied from interface: WeatherSystem
        A request to the system to download latest weather information for all favourited stations. NOTE: This should probably be thread safe if we decide to go for the thread safety challenge.
        Specified by:
        refreshFavoriteWeatherData in interface WeatherSystem

      • getWeatherStation

        public WeatherStation getWeatherStation(java.lang.String name)
        Description copied from interface: WeatherSystem
        Gets data for the first weather station with name found.
        Specified by:
        getWeatherStation in interface WeatherSystem
        Parameters:
        name - the string name for the station ie. "Laverton, Victoria"
        Returns:
        The weather station object requested if available, null otherwise.

        Description copied from interface: WeatherSystem
        Sources all stations available in a specified state.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        state - An enum value representing the state you want stations for.
        Returns:

      • PopulateStations

        private void PopulateStations(java.lang.String stationFilePath)
        Populates the stations hashmap with data from the json file passed in. The expected format is an array of state objects each containing a number of stations.
        Parameters:
        stationFilePath - The filepath to the json file

        Gets favorite station.
        Specified by:
        getFavoriteStations in interface WeatherSystem
        Returns:

      • registerRefreshableCallback

        public void registerRefreshableCallback(IWeatherSystemCallback cb)
        Description copied from interface: WeatherSystem
        Registers a refreshable interface with the system. Each time a change is made the system will call refresh on the views.
        Specified by:
        registerRefreshableCallback in interface WeatherSystem
        Parameters:
        cb - The interface to call refresh on.

      • invokeCallbacks

        private void invokeCallbacks()
        Iterates over the callback list invoking Refresh() on each.
